Addendum to AVSEC CIRCULAR No. = 02/2020

Subject:Basic requirements and Technical Specifications/ QRs for Counter-
Drone technology/ solutions for Surveillance, Detection and
Neutralisation of drones/UAVs for Airports.

In exercise of powers conferred by Section 5A of the Aircraft Act, 1934 (XXII
of 1934), read with Rule 3 (b) of the Aircraft (Security) Rules, 2011, Director General,
Bureau of Civil Aviation Security (DG, BCAS), for the purpose of the safety and
security of passengers, crew, ground personnel and the general public in all matters
relating to safeguarding against acts of unlawful interference with civil aviation,
directs that in partial modification of time frame envisaged in this Bureau AvSec
Circular No. 02/2020 to finalize the implementation of technology, the following
amendments are made;

i, Counter Drone Solutions shall be implemented at 06 JV airport (Delhi,
Mumbai, Hyderabad, Bengaluru, Nagpur & Cochin) and 02 AAI controlled airports
(Kolkata & Chennai) as pilot projects within six months from the date of issuance of
this Addendum.

ii, For remaining airports, Counter Drone Solutions shall be implemented within
one year from the date of issuance of this Addendum.

2. All other provisions of BCAS AvSee Circular No. 02/2020 dated 11.02.2020
shall remain unchanged. The above direction shall be implemented by all concerned
accordingly.

3. This issues with the approval of DG, BCAS.

(Jai fasad, IPS)
Joint Director’General
